name: Akpala
summary: Don't you want to play a magical battle, chanting magic with your voice in VR space?  A thrilling action game that offers three new experiences like never before has arrived!  ①Cast spells with your own voice, and enhance the magic by striking poses! ② Enjoy conversations with AI characters! ③ A system that records your gameplay like a movie!  Multiplayer VR game for up to 4 players, featuring 2v2 team battles and a battle royale mode. Use a variety of magic spells to defeat your enemy!
